loans.name: Hernan

texts.es: Hernán, tiene 37 años de edad, es soltero, vive en el municipio de Ilama, Santa Bárbara. Desde joven se ha dedicado a la agricultura. Hace 15 años que comenzó con el cultivo de café. La producción la vende en el mercado local en pergamino húmedo. Ha decidido solicitar un préstamo por 4,000 lempiras para limpieza y fertilización de la finca de café con el fin de tener un mejor desarrollo de sus cultivos. Su sueño es seguir produciendo la tierra y obtener mejores resultados.
texts.en: Hernán is 37 years old. He is single and lives in the municipality of Ilama, Santa Bárbara. Since he was young, Hernán has been farming. Fifteen years ago, he began to grow coffee. Hernán sells his crops in a local market in packaged in moist parchment. Hernán has decided to request a loan of 4,000 Honduran lempiras in order to clean and fertilize his coffee plants. This will help him to better care for his crops. Hernán's dream is to continue producing on his land and become more successful.

loans.use: to maintain his coffee plants by cleaning and fertilizing his farm.

loans.name: Balasan

texts.en:
Balasan is 50 years old. She and her family live in Sevan city, which is in the Gegharkunik region. Balasan lives with her husband and son, who is going to serve in the army. Her daughter is married and she lives separately with her family. Her husband works at the nearby village school as a military leader. Balasan has a specialty in technician-technologist, but now she has her own business. For 15 years she has been engaged in the cloth trading business using a rented stall. Balasan brings all the products from Yerevan wholesale markets in a rented car. 
It is obvious that the costs of her business are high and she is requesting a loan in order to be able to buy a lot of autumn-winter women's clothes to refresh her previous collections.

loans.use: To buy a lot of autumn-winter women's clothing

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Andranik

texts.en:
Andranik does his best to provide minimum living conditions for his parents and sister. The family lives in Salvard village of the Syuniq region, which is famous for its severe and cold climate. Andranik is involved in cattle breeding and some limited land cultivation. On his farm, Andranik keeps cows, calves, chickens, pigs and sheep. On the family's land he cultivates wheat, barley, and potato and sells the harvest locally. Despite his young age, Andranik is skilled and devoted to his work as a farmer. Andranik learned how to run a farm when he was very young and now he has become an experienced farmer who is the family's only breadwinner.
Now Andranik wants to enlarge the cattle he breeds, but has no financial means for that. He has applied for this loan to purchase a cow and a calf. This will increase agricultural income and Andranik will be able to improve his and his family's living conditions.
He waits for your support.

loans.use: to pay for a cow and a calf

loans.name: Johanna

texts.en:
Johana lives in the Muranga area of Kenya, which produces coffee for export. He has 9 children and has been doing this work for 25 years. His primary income sources are tea crops.

He stated what is most enjoyable about farming is selling farm produce. His biggest challenge is cultivating. Animals on the farm have been given the names of 'Kabiru.'

Johana was asked why he chose Juhudi Kilimo for this loan, he replied, "It is helping farmers do agri- business." This client was also asked what was learned during Juhudi's required micro-finance training session: 'How to manage his finances.'

His highest monthly expense is farming costs. When asked how will this loan benefit his family, Johana replied, "It will improve our living standards."

As part of Juhudi's loan appraisal process, each borrower's assets are evaluated. Johana owns the following: a cow, pump, bicycle, motorcycle' but he does not own a pig, poultry, or automobile. Juhudi Kilimo also tries to measure any change in living standards based on this loan. This borrower has in the household mosquito net, electricity, running water, TV, and DVD but does not have solar power or a sewing machine.

Note: To create this loan profile, Juhudi Kilimo used a mobile device to gather information in the field and send the data to a central online repository, thus reducing paper use, making the process more efficient, and keeping costs down."

loans.use: to purchase a dairy goat.

loans.name: Henry Alexander

texts.es:
Henry, es empleado y tambien administra un negocio de vidrio, es un hombre de hogar, vive con su esposa; Henry aprendió el negocio como ayudante, luego obtuvo un empleo y además instalo su propio negocio, en el cual tiene 5 años.
Él solicita un préstamo para la compra de vidrio y material para trabajar con el vidrio, este préstamo le ayudara a mejorar su trabajo, teniendo más material para seguir atendiendo a los clientes.
Su aspiración es tener un negocio más amplio, comprar herramientas necesarias y seguir trabajando por su hogar.
texts.en:
Henry, is employed and also has a glass business. He owns a home and lives with his wife. 

Henry learned the business as an assistant, then got a job and also started his own business which he has had for five years. 

He is asking for a loan to buy glass and material to work with the glass. This loan will help him to improve his work since he will have more material and he can keep serving his customers. 

His goal is to have a bigger business, buy the necessary tools and to keep working for his home.

loans.use: to buy glass and material to work with the glass.

loans.name: Fredis Leonel

texts.es:
Fredis tiene 31 años de edad, esta acompañado y tiene dos hijos de 6 y 3 años respectivamente, uno de ellos ya asiste a la escuela. Es una persona muy trabajadora, honesta, servicial y responsable. Es motorista de una mototaxi,  desde  la edad de los 19 años.
	EL joven se a dedicado solo al trabajo de motorista de la mototaxi. no se le ha presentado otra oportunidad de trabajo;  ya que en un tiempo su padre dejo a su madre y le toco que trabajar para ayudarle a su madre, luego su madre viajo a los estados unidos, para darle una vida mejor y se quedo con sus abuelos con el tiempo él se acompaño y hoy en día trabaja día a día para  llevarle el sustento a su familia. 

    El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar los repuestos de la mototaxi, debido a que esta dañada y no puede seguir trabajando así. Él menciona que mejorara su vida, por que al arreglar la mototaxi podrá compensar los días atrasados, que no a podido trabajar con su mototaxi; sino que ha estado trabando con una prestada y los ingresos no son lo mismo.
texts.en:
Fredis is 31 years old. He and his partner have two children, ages 6 and 3. The oldest child is currently in school. Fredis is a hardworking, honest, helpful, and responsible person. He has worked as a taxi driver since he was 19.  He has not had any other job opportunities, so driving his motor taxi is the only work he knows. When he lived with his parents, he had the responsibility of helping his mother, so he was not able to learn any other trade. Fredis' mother later left for the United States to help provide for their family, so Fredis lived with his grandparents. Currently, he works to help provide for his family.

The loan Fredis is requesting from Fundación Campo will be used to pay for some repairs to his motor taxi that is damaged to the point where he cannot work in it. Fredis comments that while his motor taxi has been damaged, he has been borrowing one to work with, but he is still behind because the profit isn't the same with a borrowed taxi.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for his motor taxi because it is damaged and he cannot work with it until it is fixed.

loans.name: Beatriz Elena

texts.es: Beatriz Elena es una mujer de 47 años de edad, es casada y madre de un hijo. Actualmente se dedica a la actividad de la confección a terceros desde hace seis años, luego de capacitarse en el área de diseño de modas. Es una mujer trabajadora y emprendedora, cada día trabaja en arduas jornadas para poder cumplir con los pedidos de sus clientes y de esta forma conseguir los ingresos para apoyar el sostenimiento de su hogar. Con el crédito que solicita en la Corporación desea hacerle mantenimiento a sus máquinas y comprar insumos (hilos, telas, resortes, botones) al por mayor y aprovechar el descuento que le hacen, para así tener la disponibilidad que requiere para cumplir  a tiempo con los encargos. Su mayor sueño es hacer crecer su negocio para brindar oportunidades de empleo a madres cabeza de familia y mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Beatriz Elena is a 47-year-old married woman and mother of one son.  She currently works sewing for third persons, she’s been doing this for six years after taking clothes-making courses.  She’s a hardworking, enterprising woman who puts in a hard day's work every day in order to fill customer orders and earn income to support her home.  

She wants to use the loan she’s asking from the Corporación to service her sewing machines and to buy supplies (thread, fabric, elastic, and buttons) at wholesale to take advantage of the discounts they offer her so that she can have supplies on hand needed to fill her orders on time.  Her greatest dream is to make her business grow so that she can offer employment to mothers who are heads of household and to improve her and her family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to service her sewing machines and to buy sewing supplies at wholesale.

loans.name: Aida

texts.es:
La señora Aida es comerciante  tiene 43 años, está casada con Francisco, juntos tienen un puesto de ventas de termos guampas  calzados y juguetes en general en la terminal hace mas de 12 años atienen  las 24 horas del día. Viven en casa propia en la ciudad de Encarnación, tienen 4 hijos 2 de ellos aun pequeños, que dependen de ellos.
Aida  ya cuenta con una importante clientela formada ya que también llevan  a distribuir  hacia la colonia de la ciudad. Gracias a esta actividad  ha podido salir adelante, mantener su hogar y solventar cualquier gasto imprevisto, operan con la Fundación Paraguaya desde el año 2004
La  Señora Aida ha solicitado este crédito para la compra de colchas frazadas para la venta, ya que de esa forma podrá seguir trabajando y mejorando su negocio.
texts.en:
Aida, 43, is a merchant.  She’s married to Francisco and together they have a stand in the terminal selling thermoses, mugs, shoes and toys in general; they’ve been in business 12 years and are open 24 hours a day.  They live in their own house in the city of Encarnación and they have four children two of which are still little and dependent on them.

Aida has a well-established regular clientele because they also distribute in the city’s neighborhood.  Thanks to this activity she’s been able to get ahead, to support her home and to cover unexpected expenses.  They’ve worked with Fundación Paraguaya since 2004.

Aida has requested this loan to buy quilted blankets to sell because she’ll be able to continue working this way and improving her business.

loans.use: to buy quilted blankets to sell.

loans.name: Victor

texts.es:
El señor Victor tiene  32 años, está casado hace 8 meses con la señora Ana de 19 años, la pareja ya tiene un hijo de 3 meses que vino a alegrar la familia.
El Sr. Victor tiene su negocio de copetín desde hace 3 años ubicado en un lugar muy bueno de la ciudad, cuenta con clientela formada debido al buen servicio que ofrece y también le surte a otros negocios dedicado al mismo rubro con productos no cocinados, el objetivo de ellos es seguir mejorando el servicio que ofrecen y así seguir progresando.
Solicita este préstamo para la compra de materia prima como harina, aceite, carne, gaseosas, jugos naturales, golosinas y así ofrecer variedad de productos a sus clientes y por ende aumentar sus ingresos mensuales.
texts.en:
Víctor, 32, has been married for 8 months to Ana, 19.  The couple already has a 3-month-old son who came to gladden the family.  Víctor has had his snack bar business for three years located in a very good spot in the city.  He has a well-established clientele because of the good service he provides; he also supplies other similar businesses  with products that don’t require cooking.  Their objective is to continue improving the service they offer and thus continue making progress.

He’s requesting this loan to buy raw materials like flour, oil, meat, soft-drinks, natural juices and snacks thus offering a variety of products to his customers and as a result increasing his monthly income.

loans.use: to buy flour, oil, meat, soft-drinks, fruit juice, snacks, etc.

loans.name: Vicente Saúl

texts.es:
Vicente tiene 30 años de edad, es casado y tiene dos hijos. Desde hace 10 años es albañil, a él le llamo la atención este oficio pues su tío se dedica a esto mismo.  Cuándo ya podía hacer el trabajo decidió construir una casa por si solo y fue como aprendió el oficio.
El préstamo que esta solicitando  Fundación Campo, es para comprar 150 bloques, 10 bolsas de  cemento y con el resto del crédito cancelar la mano de obra no calificada, para levantar el techo de su cocina. La necesidad de levantar su techo; ya que está muy bajo y a veces se le filtra el agua y es preocupante su situación por lo tanto con el crédito vivirá mejor tendrá más comodidad. Además, mejorara porque ya no sufrirán tanto calor a la hora de estar cocinando. Él pretende construir un muro de retención porque en la parte de atrás de su casa el paredón está muy cerca y cuando llueve fuerte se desprende tierra y le daña la pared.
texts.en:
Vicente, 30, is married and has two children. For the past ten years he has worked as a mason. He was interested in this work because his uncle is also a mason. 
Once he was able to do the work he decided to construct a house by himself. This is how he learned the trade. 

The loan requested by Fundación Campo is to buy 150 blocks, 10 bags of cement and with the rest of the credit to cancel the laborers that are unskilled to raise the roof in his kitchen. 

He needs to raise the roof since it is now very low and sometimes water seeps through. The situation is worrisome and with the loan he will live better and more comfortably.

Also it will improve because it will not be as hot in the kitchen when cooking. 

He plans to build a retention wall because in the back on the house the wall is too close and when it rains hard the ground loosens and damages the wall.

loans.use: to buy 150 blocks, 10 bags of cement and with the rest of the credit to cancel the laborers that are unskilled to raise the roof in his kitchen.

loans.name: Idalia Del Socorro

texts.es:
Idalia, necesita iniciar la siembra de maíz y quiere comprar los insumos agrícolas, como abono, herbicidas, foliares, esto le ayudara a mejorar la productividad de su cultivo, a que sus ingresos los invierta en el consumo de sus gastos básicos en el hogar y la educación de sus hijos.
Con la inversión anterior, ha mejorado su situación económica, están  muy  bien de salud su familia y ella.
texts.en:
Idalia needs to start planting corn and wants to buy agricultural supplies such as fertilizer, herbicides and plant fertilizers. 

This will help her improve productivity of her crops.

She will invest the loan in the consumption of basic needs for the house and her children's education. 

With the last loan she was able to improve her economic situation. Her and her family are very healthy.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies such as fertilizer, herbicides and plant fertilizers.

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es:
Francisco tiene 42 años de edad, esta acompañado y tiene tres hijos. Desde pequeño se ha dedicado a la agricultura aproximadamente 32 años, aprendió el oficio de su padre quien siempre le instruyo para que lo aprendiera.
El cliente manifiesta que comprara 4 quintales de fertilizante, dos quintales de concentrado para alimentar a 1,000 peces y el resto del financiamiento lo invertirá en la pequeña tienda que posee. Con la inversión, desea ver un buen cultivo es decir proporcionarle todo el manejo y mantenimiento que requiere y alimentar bien sus peses, para mejorar porque sacara una mayor producción, y obtendrá así más  ingresos, además sacara más rápido, al mercado su producción de peses lo que le permitirá cumplir todas las demandas de su hogar.
 Planea ampliar sus peceras, es decir sus estanques, y meterles mas peses para que se reproduzcan y obtener así más rentabilidad.
texts.en:
Francisco, 42, has a spouse and three children.  Since childhood he’s worked in agriculture, about 32 years now.  He learned the occupation from his father who always taught him so that he’d learn it.

He states that he will buy 4 quintals of fertilizer, two quintals of feed concentrate to feed 1,000 fish and the rest of the loan will be invested in the small store he has.  With this investment he hopes to see a good crop, that is, to provide it with all the care and maintenance needed and to feed his fish well in order to improve because he’ll get a better harvest and thus earn higher income.  Besides, he’ll get his fish production to market sooner which will make it possible for him to meet all his demands at home.

He plans to enlarge the fish tanks and fill them with more fish so they will reproduce to earn higher profits.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies and to invest in his small store.

loans.name: Juan De La Crúz

texts.es:
Juan tiene 26 años de edad, esta acompañado y tienen hijo. Desde pequeño trabaja en la agricultura y en la crianza de pollos hace seis meses que empezó. Siempre ha sido agricultor desde los 15 años. 
El préstamo que esta solicitando  Fundación Campo, es para comprar 10 pliegos de lámina para techar su  casa, 2 quintales de concentrado para sus pollos  y 2 quintales de fertilizantes.
Con la inversión, techara su casa, para protegerse de la lluvia ya que las paredes se le están deteriorando y podrá dormir tranquilo sin pensar que se mojara por las noches cuando este descansando.
Entre sus planes esta, ampliar el negocio de los pollos, hacer más grande la galera y sembrar más granos (maíz, frijol) de lo que hasta hoy siembra.
texts.en:
Juan, 26, is in a relationship and has a son. Since he was young he has worked in agriculture and six months ago he started raising chickens. 

He has been a farmer since the age of 15. 

The loan requested through Fundación Campo is to buy ten sheets of sheet roofing for his house, two quintals of feed for his chickens and two quintals of fertilizer. 

With the loan he will fix his house to protect him from the rain since the walls are deteriorating and he will be able to sleep well without having to think they will get wet while he is resting. 

His plans include to expand his chicken business, increase the size of the shed and plant more grain (corn, beans) then what he plants today.

loans.use: to buy ten sheets of sheet roofing for his house, two quintals of feed for his chickens and two quintals of fertilizer.

loans.name: Romualdo

texts.es:
Romualdo tiene 47 años de edad, tiene dos hijos.  Desde joven se dedica a la agricultura, mas o menos 35 años de experiencia, siempre ha sido agricultor.
El cliente manifiesta que comprara 5 quintales de fertilizante,  cancelara  la mano de obra para que  le preparen la parcela donde quiere sembrar yuca.	 La necesidad de ampliar sus cultivos, es decir sembrar más de lo que acostumbra sembrar pues no tiene otra fuente de empleo que le permita salir adelante.
Así, mejorara sus ingresos al sacar la cosecha y darle mejor atención a sus hijos ya que ellos necesitan lo mas básico; pues aun están pequeños y necesitan alimentación digna, vivienda y los cuidados que requieren. Su deseo, es comprar otro pedacito de terreno que esta cerca de su casa y heredárselos a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Romualdo, 47, has two children.  He’s worked in agriculture since he was young, for about 35 years now more or less; he’s always worked in agriculture.

He states that he wants to buy five quintals of fertilizer and to pay for labor costs to prepare a parcel of land where he wants to plant manioc.  He needs to expand his crop, that is to plant more than usual because he has no other source of employment that will allow him to get ahead.

Thus, he will improve his income when he gathers the harvest and will provide better attention to his children since they need the basics but they are still little and need proper food, housing and care.  His wish is to buy another small parcel of land that’s near his house to leave to his children.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies and pay labor costs.

loans.name: Christian

texts.es:
Christian tiene 20 años vive con sus padres y hermanos, trabaja en un servicentro encargado de una tienda  y por la noche va a la Facultad.
Es un joven muy trabajador, que se está esforzando por salir el día de mañana. El está cursando el primer año de la carrera de Ingeniería  Eléctrica,  y una vez  que termine su carrera quiere montar su propia empresa de esa forma ser independiente.
Solicita de este crédito para poder cubrir las cuotas de su universidad, lo cual le será de mucha ayuda. Agradece por esta oportunidad que está recibiendo que le será de mucha ayuda.
texts.en: Christian, 20, lives with his parents and siblings.  He works in a service center managing a store and attends classes at night.  He’s a very hardworking young man who is striving to get ahead in the future.  He’s in the first year of Electrical Engineering and once he finishes his career he wants to set up his own firm and be independent this way.  He’s asking for this loan to cover university tuition fees which will be of great help.  He’s grateful for the opportunity he’s getting which will be very helpful to him.

loans.use: to pay university tuition fees.

loans.name: Shiela

texts.en:
As a married parent of four children, Shiela works hard to support her family. She has a food vending business in the Philippines, and she earns additional income by selling charcoal.

Shiela is borrowing PHP 4,000 through NWTF. She will use the loan to purchase additional ingredients for her food vending business. She has been sustaining her business activities through her past 1 loan from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream -- to build and expand her business, to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional ingredients for the foods she prepares and sells

loans.name: Jose Alberto

texts.es:
José, vive con su esposa y dos hijos, juntos administran una mini ferretería, venden CD Y DVD, tambien controles, gorras y otros productos, el aprendió el negocio por cuenta propia, antes era agricultor, ahora se ha vuelto comerciante y tiene 8 años de estar en el negocio.
Solicita un préstamo para la compra de más mercadería para surtir el negocio, CD, DVD, tenazas, estuches, controles, antenas, focos, este préstamo le ayudara a realizar una buena inversión para mejorar las ventas en el negocio.
 Su aspiración es mejorar el local de venta, su negocio ampliarlo y agregar más productos, tambien ayudar a sus hijos.
texts.en:
José lives with his wife and two children. Together they run a small hardware store, where they sell CDs and DVDs, as well as remote controls, baseball caps, and other products. He learned this business on his own. He was an agricultural worker before, but now he has become a businessman and has been in this business for eight years.

He is asking for a loan to purchase more merchandise to stock his business, including CDs, DVDs, pliers, pencil cases, remote controls, antennas, and flashlights. This loan will help him invest in improving his business's sales. His goal is to improve his shop, grow his business, add more products, and help his children.

loans.use: to buy CDs, DVDs, pliers, pencil cases, remote controls, antennas, and flashlights.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy ice-cream at wholesale and also tables and chairs.

loans.name: Arnaldo

texts.es:
Arnaldo es una persona que el día de mañana quiere ser un buen profesional, es por eso que se está esforzando. Cuenta que su familia siempre lo ha apoyado y que está muy agradecido por ello.
Está estudiando la carrera de ingeniería agrónoma, y cuenta que quiere poder ayudar a su familia por medio de sus estudios, y de esa forma poder retribuirles toda la ayuda que ellos le dieron.
Esta solicitando de este crédito para poder invertirlo en pagar sus clases, y también poder pagar sus cuotas, lo cual le será de mucha ayuda y le permitirá seguir estudiando.
texts.en: Arnaldo’s a person who wants to become a good professional in future which is why he’s striving.  He relates that his family has always supported him and he’s very grateful for that.  He’s studying Agronomy and he relates that he wants to be able to help his family by means of his studies and repay them this way for all the help they’ve given him.  He’s asking for this loan to be able to pay for his classes and also to pay his fees which will be of great help for him to continue studying.

loans.use: to pay tuition and fees.

loans.name: Rosana

texts.es:
Rosana es de la ciudad de Pilar, está estudiando la carrera de Contabilidad, con la cual quiere crecer y ayudar a su familia.
Ella comenta que lo que la destaca de los demás estudiantes es que se dedica mucho a sus estudios, y que sobresale siempre.
Solicita de este crédito para poder pagar sus cuotas, lo cual la ayudará mucho. Ella es una persona con gran potencial y lo demuestra por medio de su buen rendimiento en la universidad.
texts.en: Rosana is from the city of Pilar and is studying Accounting that she wants to grow and help her family with.  She comments that what sets her apart from the other students is that she is very dedicated to her studies and that makes her stand out always.  She requests this loan to pay her tuition which will be very helpful.  She’s a person with great potential that she demonstrates by her good results in university.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Adan

texts.es:
Adan es de la ciudad de Concepción, está estudiando la carrera de Ingeniería Comercial, y cuenta que es una carrera que le gusta mucho.
Se esfuerza por poder ser un buen profesional, útil a las demás personas, y también a sí mismo. Su sueño es seguir estudiando y haciendo especializaciones una vez terminada su carrera.
Solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en pagar sus clases de la universidad, como así también comprar útiles para su carrera. Agradece por esta oportunidad que el esta recibiendo.
texts.en: Adán is from the city of Concepción and is studying Commercial Engineering; he says that it’s a career he likes very much.  He strives to become a good professional that’s useful to others and also to himself.  His dream is to continue studying and becoming specialized once he finishes his career.  He requests this loan to pay for his university courses as well as to buy school supplies.  He is grateful for this opportunity he’s getting.

loans.use: to pay tuition and to pay for school supplies.

loans.name: Romela

texts.en:
Romela is 53 years old and married. She has three children. Romela works hard to provide for her family, running a general store in the Philippines. She has been running the general store for 11 years, and she also earns income by fattening pigs.

She requested a PHP 40,000 loan through NWTF. She will use the loan to purchase more groceries to sell at her store. Romela has borrowed and repaid 17 loans from NWTF, before this loan. She aspires to save enough money to support the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell at her store.

loans.name: Genalyn

texts.en:
Genalyn is a hardworking entrepreneur, who has a general store business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for one year, and she earns additional income by fattening pigs.

She is borrowing PHP 6,000 through NWTF. She will use the loan to buy additional stock to sell at her store, including household goods like soap, shampoo, canned goods, and milk. Genalyn has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts, with the help of loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy additional stock to sell at her store, including household goods like soap, shampoo, canned goods, and milk

loans.name: Joao

texts.pt:
João de 33 anos de idade, é técnico administrativo numa escola do nível secundário e nas horas vagas faz prestação de serviços de carpintaria na sua casa, onde conta com 2 trabalhadores. Vive na casa do pai, vive maritalmente há 8 anos e é casado oficialmente há 2. Tem 2 filhos ainda menores e sustenta também um irmão que vive com ele.
Com o valor do empréstimo irá comprar cimento, areia e material para fazer aros, janelas e portas para dar continuidade à construção de sua casa.
O seu desejo é terminar a faculdade daqui a 2 anos, fazer a casa dos seus sonhos pois a que está a construir neste momento é temporária (só tem uma dependência), comprar uma viatura para ajudar nas deslocações e ter uma estrutura na sua casa reconhecida para continuar com os trabalhos de carpintaria.
Diz que gosta de trabalhar com a Hluvuku devido as modalidades de pagamento que são flexíveis e adaptadas às preferências do cliente e não tem demasiadas formalidades para aquisição do crédito.
texts.en:
33-year-old João is an administrative assistant in a high school. In his free time he works from home providing carpentry services and has two employees. He lives in his father's house and has been married for 8 years, having made it official 2 years ago. He has two underage children and also supports one brother who lives with him.
With the amount of the loan he'll purchase cement, sand and supplies for making window frames and doors, so he can continue building his house.
His wishes are to finish college within two years; to build his dream house, since the one he's currently building is a temporary one (it only has one room); to acquire a vehicle to help him get around; and to have a well-known space set up in his house in order to keep on doing his carpentry work.
He states that he enjoys working with Hluvuku because the repayment options are flexible and tailored to suit the client's preferences. Also, there aren't too many formalities for getting a loan.

loans.use: to purchase cement, sand and supplies for making window frames and doors, so he can continue building his house.

loans.name: Laurinda

texts.pt:
Laurinda de 48 anos, é operária agrícola e trabalha das 6.30 as 15.00 hrs. Vive maritalmente há 32 anos e tem 4 filhos, dos quais apenas 1 estuda e os restantes já são maiores de idade. Sustenta também 1 neto que vive com ela.
Com o crédito quer comprar cimento, portas e janelas para dar continuidade a construção de sua casa.
Projectos para o futuro são terminar a construção de sua casa e comprar mobília.
Diz que irá pedir mais crédito para concretizar os planos traçados e para isso promete cumprir com o calendário de pagamentos.
texts.en:
48-year-old Laurinda is a farm worker and works from 6:30 a.m. to 3 p.m. She has been married for 32 years and has four children. Only one of her children is in school; the others are already adults. She also supports one grandson who lives with her.
With the loan she wishes to purchase cement, doors and windows in order to continue building her house.
Her future projects are to finish building her house and to buy furniture.
She states that she'll apply for more loans so that she can achieve the plans she has made, and for that reason she pledges to comply with the repayment schedule.

loans.use: to purchase cement, doors and windows in order to continue building her house.

loans.name: Arnaldo

texts.pt:
Arnaldo tem 48 anos, é militar e trabalha das 7h30 às 15h30. É casado há 5 anos e tem 4 filhos dos quais 2 estudam e os restantes são menores de idade.
Com o valor do empréstimo quer comprar cimento e areia, para dar continuidade à construção de sua casa.
No futuro espera fazer uma loja na sua casa que irá ajudar na ampliação da renda familiar.
Diz que irá pedir mais empréstimos e pagar nas datas certas.
texts.en:
Arnaldo is 48 years old and a serviceman, and he works from 7:30 a.m. to 3:30 p.m. He has been married for five years and has four children. Two of his children study and the others are underage.
With the amount of the loan he wishes to purchase cement and sand in order to continue building his house.
In the future he hopes to set up a store in his house, which will help increase his family's income.
He states that he'll apply for more loans and make the repayments on the scheduled dates.

loans.use: to purchase cement and sand in order to continue building his house.

loans.name: Judith

texts.es:
Judith es de la ciudad de Pilar, una persona muy trabajadora y que está luchando por crecer y mejorar su vida.
Ella cuenta que desea llegar a ser una licenciada ya que tendrá una salida laboral, y podrá ayudar a su familia por medio de sus estudios, hoy esta siguiendo la carrera de Ciencias en la educación, con lo cual desea poder ayudar a quienes, que, al igual que ella quieren aprender.
Solicita d este crédito para poder invertirlo en los gastos de titulación, ya que tiene  muchos trámites que realizar y quiere poder cubrirlos. También agradece por la ayuda que esta recibiendo.
texts.en: Judith is from the city of Pilar.  She’s a very hardworking person who is striving to grow and to improve her life.  She relates that she wants to get her bachelor’s degree because she’d have access to employment and be able to help her family by means of her studies.  She’s currently studying Education Science that she wants to use to be able to help those who like her want to learn.  She’s asking for this loan to pay her degree fees because she has many official transactions to carry out and she wants to be able to pay for them.  She’s grateful for the help she’s getting.

loans.use: to pay for degree fees.

loans.name: Hernán

texts.es: Hernán es un hombre de 46 años de edad, es casado y no tiene hijos. Llegó a la ciudad debido a la falta de empleo y dificultades económicas que tenía en el municipio donde vivía. Actualmente se dedica a la venta de mercancía como tendidos acolchados, tapetes, toallas, cortinas, entre otros, actividad que realiza hace tres años, cuando comenzó a ofrecerlas puerta a puerta en diferentes barrios de la ciudad y venderlas a crédito. El crédito que solicita lo desea invertir en la compra de más mercancía al por mayor (cobijas, acolchados, cortinas, toallas) ya que puede aprovechar los descuentos que le hacen por compra de contado y así poder generar buenas utilidades. Su principal sueño es hacer crecer su negocio para tener la posibilidad de ofrecer oportunidades de empleo, ya que quiere contar con el apoyo de 2 personas que le realicen el cobro de facturas.
texts.en:
Hernán is a 46-year-old married man; he does not have children.  He came to the city because of the lack of employment and economic difficulties in the town where he lived.  He currently works selling merchandise like quilted blankets, mats, towels and curtains, among others, an activity he’s been doing for three years since he started selling them on credit door to door in various neighborhoods in the city.

The loan he’s asking for is to buy more merchandise at wholesale (blankets, quilts, curtains and towels) because he can take advantage of discounts he gets for paying cash and his profits will be higher.  His main dream is to make his business grow so that he can offer employment opportunities because he wants to hire to people to collect payments.

loans.use: to buy merchandise at wholesale.

loans.name: Claudia

texts.es: Claudia es una mujer de 36 años de edad, es casada y tiene un hijo de 2 años. Actualmente tiene un negocio de repostería, gracias a la capacitación que ha obtenido haciendo cursos; con este negocio genera ingresos económicos para suplir las necesidades de su hogar, ya que en este momento su esposo se encuentra desempleado.  El dinero que solicita es para invertir en otra capacitación que quiere realizar para complementar sus conocimientos y así poder ofrecer más variedad de productos a los clientes, lo que le permitirá aumentar sus ventas y por ende sus ingresos, para tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Claudia is a 36-year-old married woman; she has a two-year-old son.  She currently has a pastry business thanks to training she’s gotten by taking courses.  With this business she generates income to meet her household needs since her husband is currently unemployed.  The money she’s requesting is to invest in another training course that she wants to take to add to her knowledge and be able to offer a wider variety of products to her customers which will lead to increased sales and increased income as a result so she can have better quality of life.

loans.use: to pay for a course.

loans.name: Teresa

texts.pt:
A D. Teresa de 55 anos de idade, é viúva e vive na sua própria casa. Tem 5 filhos, 3 dos quais são maiores de idade e outro está a frequentar a escola no ensino secundário. Ela è empacotadora numa empresa de bananas.
O presente empréstimo será utilizado para dar continuidade à construção da sua casa, mais precisamente na compra de material de construção (portas, janelas, chapas, barrotes, cimento), no pagamento de transporte do mesmo material e no pagamento da mão-de-obra.
A D. Teresa tem como esperança melhorar as suas condições de vida.
texts.en:
Teresa is 55 years old and a widow. She lives in a house that she owns and has five children. Three of her children are adults and the other one attends high school. She's a packer for a banana company.
The current loan will be used to continue building her house, more specifically to purchase construction supplies (doors, windows, metal sheets, beams and cement) and to pay for transportation of the supplies and for labor.
Teresa's hope is to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies (doors, windows, metal sheets, beams and cement) and to pay for labor and for transportation of the supplies, so she can continue building her house.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy salon items for her beauty salon business

loans.name: Eulogio

texts.es:
Eulogio proviene de una familia muy humilde, su padre ya falleció, y comenta que son varios hermanos, pero que solo él se quedo con mamá y la está ayudando, para el sustento del hogar, ya que ella es ama de casa.
El tiene como meta llegar a ser un gran profesional con lo cual quiere seguir ayudando a su familia. Cuenta que está siguiendo una licenciatura en didáctica universitaria.
Dice también que por medio de estos estudios podrá ayudar a las personas que quieran aprender de igual manera que el.
Solicita de este crédito para poder cubrir los gastos de sus clases, y también para poder comprar los materiales de sus estudios.
texts.en: Eulogio comes from a very humble family; his father is already deceased and he comments that he has several siblings but only he stayed with his mother and is helping her to support the home since she’s a housewife.  His goal is to become a professional in order to continue helping his family.  He relates that he’s studying for a bachelor’s degree in university teaching.  He also says that by means of his studies he will be able to help people who want to learn the same way he does.  He’s asking for this loan to cover the costs of his courses and also to be able to buy his study materials.

loans.use: to pay for his courses.

loans.name: Mujeres Trabajadoras Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Mujeres trabajadoras está en su primer ciclo , ellas están aprendiendo a trabajar juntas, y quieren crecer por medio de las capacitaciones y con la ayuda de la fundación paraguaya. Ellas están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, para poder conocer la situación de cada una de ellas.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Norma, ella, a través del esfuerzo y el trabajo continuo y las aplicaciones de los comportamientos vitales de una mujer exitosa  quiere superar su pobreza. Ella se dedica a las ventas, y tiene una pequeña despensa con la que surte y da a sus vecinos los insumos para el día a día.
Ella solicita este crédito para la compra de verduras, frutas, leche, panificados y demás, con lo que podrá seguir con sus ventas y ayudar así a su familia con los ingresos.
texts.en:
The group called “Mujeres Trabajadoras” (Working Women) is in its first cycle.  They are learning to work together and want to grow by means of the training and with help from Fundación Paraguaya.  They are taking the poverty elimination survey in order to know the situation each one of them is in.

One of the members is Norma.  Through her effort and non-stop work and by applying vital behaviors of a successful woman she wants to overcome her poverty.  She works in sales and has a small grocery store that she stocks and provides her neighbors with the things they need daily.

She’s requesting this loan to buy vegetables, fruit, milk, baked goods and others so she can continue with her sales and help her family with the income this way.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, fruit, milk, baked goods, etc.

loans.name: Hazel

texts.en:
Hazel works hard to support her family. She is married. She has a barber shop business in the Philippines, a business in which she has been involved for three years.

Hazel requested a PHP 5,000 loan through NWTF. She will use the loan to purchase additional equipment for barbering. In the future, Hazel would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional equipment for her barber shop

loans.name: Marieta

texts.en:
As a widowed parent of one child, Marieta works hard to support her family. She has a restaurant business in the Philippines, and she earns additional income from keeping a general store and owning a house for rent.

Marieta is borrowing PHP 4,000 through NWTF. She will use the loan to buy more ingredients for the foods she will serve at her restaurant. Marieta has been sustaining her business activities, with the help of one previous loan from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream, to save money and expand her business even more.

loans.use: to buy more ingredients for the foods she will serve at her restaurant.

loans.name: Marine

texts.en:
Marine has been involved in agriculture for 12 years. Over these 12 years of hard work, Marine now owns a beautiful and successful farm which includes 20 chickens and a pig and also comprises a plot of agricultural land where she cultivates corn, cucumbers, tomatoes and greens. 

Marine lives in a small and beautiful village Poqr Vedi, which is located in Ararat region. She lives together with her husband and two children who help her with farming activities. 

Marine's only income comes from agriculture; that's why it is very important for her to enlarge her farm and earn more income. In applying for this loan Marine plans to purchase fertilizer and seeds for expanding the cultivation of the land.

Marine has great plans for her farm and she hopes that lenders will support her to achieve her goals.

loans.use: to pay for fertilizer and seeds for cultivation

loans.name: Margarit

texts.en:
Margarit works at a local bakery and has many years of experience in this field. Margarit lives in Vedi village with her family which consists of her husband and three grown-up children. In order to cover family costs Margarit is also involved in agriculture. She owns a small plot of land where she cultivates tomatoes, peaches, apricots, and apples. Margarit's husband doesn't work and helps her with running the farm. He sells the gathered harvest in the local market and gets income which is very important for them.

Margarit has applied for this loan to pay for wheat and fertilizer, which is very important for successful cultivation of their land. This loan is important for the whole family to earn more income and make their life better.

They wait for your support!

loans.use: to pay for wheat and fertilizer

loans.name: Anna's Group

texts.fr: Ce groupe est composé de 7 femmes unies par de bonnes relations sociales et économiques. Anna est la représentante du groupe, elle est âgé de 44 ans ,marié et mère de 4 enfants dont 2 garçons et 2 filles.ils ont 22,19,17,et 11 ans. Elle fait du commerce de chaussures de boubous et de parfum.Elle part dans un pays frontalier pour acheter  sa marchandise ,puis elle dédouane et vient chez elle pour vendre.Elle s'en sorte très bien et son point fort s'est le faite qu'elle a beaucoup de connaissance et sait comment négocier pour recouvrer son argent.Avec son prêt elle compte acheter 50 paires de chaussures garçons à 175000f; 50 paires filles à 100000f, 20 boubous de bazin teint à 250000f. Avec ses bénéfices elle paie le scolarité de ses enfants et aide son marie dans les dépenses familiales .
texts.en:
This group is composed of seven women, united by good social and economic relationships. Anna is the group representative; she is 44, married, and the mother of four children, two sons and two daughters, aged 22, 19, 17, and 11. She sells shoes, boubous (wide African robes) and perfume. She goes to a neighboring country to buy her merchandise and after going through customs, comes home to sell her goods.

She does very well at this and her strong point is the fact that she knows a lot of people and knows how to negotiate to recoup her money. With her loan she intends to buy  50 pairs of shoes for boys for 175,000 f; 50 pairs of shoes for girls for 100,000 f, and 20 boubous made of dyed damask for 250,000 f. With her profit she pays her children's school fees and helps her husband with family expenses.

loans.use: to buy 50 pairs of shoes for boys for 175,000 f; 50 pairs of shoes for girls for 100,000 f, and 20 boubous made of dyed damask for 250,000 f.

loans.name: Oretha

texts.en:
Oretha, a 40-year-old business woman from Liberia, is married and has seven children between the ages of 25 and 12. Only three are currently attending school, and they all live at home. Oretha completed grade 12 before starting her business. She describes herself as a hardworking woman.

Oretha lives and works in Buchanan, the capital City of Grand Bassa County. It is located by the sea and is well known for its beaches and delicious fish. Many logging companies are also based in the city. Residents love eating fufu, cassava based dough typically eaten with soup or sauce. Most people in the city are Bassa speakers, one of the indigenous languages of Liberia.

For the past three years Oretha has had a table business which sells fresh fish. She works from 8 a.m. to 5 p.m. daily, and her greatest business challenge is low income. Oretha intends to use the loan to buy more fresh fish to resell. She hopes to one day own a house.

Oretha wants to thank Kiva lenders in advance for their help.

loans.use: to buy more fresh fish to resell.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth is a Liberian. She resides in Buchanan, the capital city of Grand Bassa County. The county is located by the sea and is known for its beaches and fish. In addition, many logging companies are also located in the city. People in Buchanan are known in the country for their love of fufu, a cassava based dough typically eaten with soup or sauce. 

Elizabeth is 30, married with three children 12 to 5 years old who are currently living at home and attending school. She has owned her own small shop selling bread with fry eggs, tea, etc. for the past five years. She will use the loan proceeds to purchase more eggs, bread, oil, milk, sugar, tea, etc.  

On average, she works eight hours at her business from Monday to Saturday. She started her business with a small amount of money from her husband. She transports her merchandise by shared taxi. She cites the rainy season as her biggest challenge. Her favorite part of her business is the money she makes. In the future, she would like to build a house.  

She is grateful for your support!

loans.use: to purchase more eggs, bread, oil, milk, sugar, tea, etc.

loans.name: Ruth

texts.en:
Ruth is a 35-year-old businesswoman from Liberia.  She is married and has three children, between 19 and 2 years old.  Only two are currently attending school, and they all live at home.  Ruth completed the sixth grade, before starting her business.  She describes herself as a hard-working woman.

She lives and works in Buchanan, the capital city of Grand Bassa County. Buchanan is located by the sea.  It is well-known for its beaches and delicious fish.  Many logging companies are also based in the city.  Residents of the city love eating 'fufu,' a dish made from a cassava-based dough that is typically eaten with soup or sauce.  Most people in the city speak Bassa, one of the indigenous languages of Liberia.
 
Ruth has a table business, where she has been selling food items like Vita, oil, pepper, and onion, for the past three years.  She started in business by selling for her mother.  She works at her business from 8:00AM to 4:00PM each day.  Her greatest challenge in business is low income. She intends to use the loan to buy more Vita, oil, pepper, onion and similar items, to resell at her table.  She likes her business, because it helps her to support her home.  She hopes one day to own a house.  She wants to thank the Kiva lenders, in advance, for their help.

loans.use: to buy more Vita, oil, pepper, onion and similar items, to resell at her table business.

loans.name: Denis Patricia

texts.es: Denis Patricia es una mujer de 38 años de edad, es soltera y no tiene hijos. Actualmente se dedica a vender postres, actividad que aprendió cuando decidió capacitarse para poder trabajar como independiente y generar los ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de su hogar. El crédito que solicita con la Corporación será invertido en un curso de capacitación, que le permitirá ampliar sus conocimientos y poder aumentar la venta de sus productos para generar mayores ingresos económicos. Su principal sueño es tener un buen negocio que le permita mantener una estabilidad económica y un mejor nivel de calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Denis Patricia is a 38 year-old woman. She is single and does not have children. 

She currently earns a living selling desserts. She learned this activity when she decided to train to be able to work independently to generate the income required to maintain her home. 

The loan that she is requesting from Kiva will be invested in an advanced training course. This will allow her to expand her knowledge and to increase her sales to generate a higher income. 

Her dream is to have a good business that provides economic stability and a better quality of life.

loans.use: pay for an advanced training course.

loans.name: Jovulet

texts.en:
Jovulet is aged 63 years and a widow. She has six children, only one of whom is still in school. She also has one orphan who stays with her, because of vulnerable reasons.

Now she has taken a loan of UGX 1,000,000. She is going to finish up her rental houses. She has no other sources of income. She started this business in 2002, when a university was set up in her area, which led to a higher demand for housing by students. She is going to finish the rentals before the school term begins.

She started the rental business with the aim of getting school fees for her children. Her major challenge is paying tuition for her child at university. Another challenge is that the rental income is irregular. She hopes that after finishing, her rental income will increase. She is a hard-working lady. She thanks the institution for coming to her rescue, in a time of need.

loans.use: To buy things needed to finish up the rental units, including paint and cement

loans.name: San Jose Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado San Jose está en su ciclo número 7 del programa de comité de mujeres. Ellas gracias al trabajo en conjunto que vienen haciendo a través de los ciclos están pudiendo mejorar sus vidas y las de su familia, y esa es la pretensión de cada una de ellas.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Jeremias, quien se dedica a la venta de todo tipo de productos, como ser ropas, perfumes, zapatos y todos esos accesorios. También se debe destacar que ella es una persona con muchas ganas de salir adelante e ir mejorando su vida, es por lo cual se viene esforzando.
La Sra. Jeremias Solicita de este crédito para la compra de de prendas, calzados, perfumes y demás, con lo que podrá seguir haciendo sus ventas y procurando los ingresos para su familia.
texts.en: The “San José” group is in its seventh cycle in the women’s committee program.  Thanks to the work that they are doing together through the loan cycles, they are able to improve their lives and the lives of their families, and that is the aspiration of each one of them.  One of the members is Jeremías, who is engaged in the sale of all types of products such as clothing, perfume, shoes, and all the accessories. In addition, it must be noted that she is a person with a great desire to succeed and improve her life and for this reason, she is working hard.  Jeremías is requesting this loan for the purchase of clothing, footwear, perfume, and other items so that she can continue making sales and earning income for her family.

loans.use: to purchase of clothing, footwear, perfume, and other items.

loans.name: Ninfa

texts.es:
La señora Ninfa es costurera, elabora juego de sabanas; vive en casa propia con un acabado fino y piso de machimbre, su vivienda esta ubicada el la zona de Irpavi de la ciudad de La Paz.
Ninfa elabora juego de sabanas, del cual genera sus ingresos para cubrir sus gastos de alimentación, luz, agua;  el crédito lo  requiere para la compra de materia prima comprara tela, encaje, hilo; para mejorar su ingresos y su calidad de vida.
El sueño de Ninfa es tener un taller de costura.
texts.en:
Ninfa is a seamstress, and she makes sets of bed sheets. She lives in her own house with wood flooring. Her home is located in the Irpavi area of La Paz. 
Ninfa makes sets of bed sheets from which she earns income to cover her food, electricity, water. She needs the loan to buy raw materials such as fabric, lace, and thread, which will improve her income and her quality of life.
Ninfa dreams of owning her own seamstress shop.

loans.use: to buy sewing supplies.

loans.name: San Cayetano Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado SAN CAYETANO está en su ciclo número cuarto del programa de comité de mujeres, donde ellas formaron un grupo muy trabajador y unido, donde ponen todo de sí y se esfuerzan por crecer.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Lucía, quien se dedica a la decoración de eventos, comenta que es muy hábil en lo que hace, y eso la ayuda a hacerse promoción por sí misma y de esa forma hacerse de muy buena clientela, ella es muy trabajadora, y cuenta que gracias a su buen trabajo está saliendo adelante y dando a su familia todo lo que necesitan.
Solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de telas, globos, cintas y demás productos para poder seguir con su trabajo y por medio de eso seguir ayudando a su familia. Todas agradecen por la oportunidad que están recibiendo.
texts.en:
The group called SAN CAYETANO is in its fourth cycle of the women's committee program. They form a very hard-working and united group, where they give of themselves entirely and make an effort to grow.

One of the members is Lucía, who makes a living by decorating for events. She comments that she is very skilled in what she does, and that helps her to promote herself and thus gather a very good clientele. She is very hard-working and says that thanks to her good work she is getting ahead and giving her family everything it needs.

She is asking for this loan to be able to invest in the purchase of fabrics, balloons, ribbons and other products to be able to continue with her work and thus keep helping her family. All of the women appreciate the opportunity that they are receiving.

loans.use: to buy fabrics, balloons, ribbons and other products

loans.name: Alba Nelly

texts.es: Alba Nelly es una mujer soltera y madre cabeza de hogar. Actualmente se dedica a atender su negocio donde vende todo lo relacionado con productos para peluquería y belleza en general, después de haber laborado muchos años como operaria, en una empresa de confecciones. Es una mujer emprendedora y dedicada, mientras laboraba en las confecciones fue ahorrando hasta completar su capital para montar su propio negocio, en el cual labora largas jornadas cada día. Con el crédito que solicita desea comprar dos vitrinas para exhibir los productos y más surtido (tratamientos capilares, cosméticos, esmaltes para uñas, tintes) con el fin de tener mayor disponibilidad de productos y diversidad de marcas para satisfacer las necesidades de los clientes. Su principal sueño es montar otro negocio en un local más central para que su hija lo administre y de esta forma incrementar sus ingresos para el sostenimiento de las necesidades de su hogar.
texts.en:
Alba Nelly is a single mother head of household. Currently she has a business selling hair salon and beauty products in general after having worked many years in a dressmaking business. She is a very hardworking and dedicated woman. While she worked as a dressmaker she saved money until she had enough capital set aside to start her own business. She worked long hours every day to do so.

With the loan she is requesting she wants to purchase two glass cabinets to display her merchandise, as well as more supplies (hair treatments, cosmetics, nail polish, dyes) with the goal of having a greater diversity and quantity of products available to satisfy her clients’ needs.

Her principal dream is to start another business in a more central location so that her daughter can manage it and in this way she can increase her income and thus support her household’s needs.

loans.use: to purchase two glass cabinets to display her products and more supplies (hair treatments, cosmetics, nail polish and dyes).

loans.name: María Yesenia

texts.es: María Yesenia, tiene la edad  de 24 años, está en unión libre,  vive con su hijo y esposo, los cuales son mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de madera y materiales y pagar mano de obra en la reparación a la vivienda, y de esta manera eliminar algunas entradas de agua a la vivienda en el periodo de lluvia que ya casi inicia y así poderle ofrecer una mejor calidad de vida a su familia. Con esta compra pretende hacer una mejora de buena calidad a su casa y que sus hijos y esposo mejoré su calidad de vida y aprovechar precios bajos en algunos materiales y que son de buena calidad. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: María Yesenia is 24 years old, in a civil union, and lives with her son and husband, who are her main priority. With her loan she intends to buy wood, materials, and pay laborers to make repairs to her home, and in this way eliminate the areas where water enters the home during the rainy season which is about to start. In this way she can offer a better quality of life to her family. With the purchase she intends to improve the quality of her home and the quality of life for her husband and child, while taking advantage of the low prices of some materials that are of good quality. This is the first loan she has received from FUDECOSUR. She has not had any prior loans from the banks, but FUDECOSUR has provided her the loan with greater ease and much lower interest rates.

loans.use: to make repairs on her home

loans.name: Martha

texts.es:
La señora Martha tiene una tienda de barrio en su domicilio, vive en casa propia en un acabado de fino y piso de machimbre, su vivienda esta ubicada el la zona de Irpavi de la ciudad de La Paz.
Martha tiene una tienda de barrio donbde vende diversos productos, del cual genera sus ingresos para cubrir sus gastos de alimentación, luz, agua;  el crédito lo  requiere para el aumento de capital comprara gaseosas, galletas, arroz, azúcar y otros para surtir su tienda y asi mejorar sus ingresos y su calidad de vida.
El sueño de Martha es ampliar su negocio.
texts.en:
Martha has a neighborhood store in her home. She lives in her own home, with finished walls and tongue and groove wood flooring. Her home is located in the Irpavi area of the city of La Paz.

Martha has a neighborhood store where she sells various products, from which she generates income to cover expenses for food, electricity and water. She needs the loan to increase her working capital. She will buy soft drinks, cookies, rice, sugar and other items to stock her store and thus improve her income and her quality of life.

Martha's dream is to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks, cookies, rice, sugar and other items for her neighborhood store.

loans.name: Dayana

texts.es:
La señorita Dayana es empleada de un restaurante;vive en  alquiler con sus padres con un acabado de adobe y piso de cemento, su vivienda esta ubicada el la zona de Irpavi de la ciudad de La Paz.
Dayana es empleada, del cual genera sus ingresos para cubrir sus gastos de alimentación, transporte y educación,  el crédito lo  requiere para la matricula de universidad ella estudiara administración de empresas y así mejorar su nivel de educación.
El sueño de Dayana es culminar sus estudios
texts.en:
Srta. Dayana works at a restaurant. She lives with her parents in a rental property that contains a pair of rooms that have an adobe finish and cement floors. Her home is located in the Irpavi area of the city of La Paz.

Dayana is employed and the income from her job is used to cover expenses such as food, transportation, and education. The loan she is requesting will be used for her university tuition. She is studying Business Administration and in this way she will improve her level of education.

Dayana’s dream is to finish her studies.

loans.use: to pay the university tuition where she is studying business administration.

loans.name: Rosario

texts.es:
Rosario se dedica a la elaboración de diversas masitas, vive en casa propia en un acabado fino  y piso de cemento, su vivienda esta ubicada el la zona de Irpavi de la ciudad de La Paz.
Rosario elabora masitas como ser empanadas, queques y otros, para cubrir sus gastos de alimentación, luz, agua; el crédito lo requiere para la compra de insumos como ser harina, azúcar, mantequilla, y asi mejorar su ingresos y su calidad de vida.
El sueño de Rosario es tener su pastelería.
texts.en: Rosario works making various baked goods. She lives in her own finished house that has a cement floor; it’s located in the city of La Paz’s Irpavi zone. Rosario makes baked goods like turnovers, cakes and other baked goods to pay for her food, electricity and water costs. She needs the loan to buy ingredients like flour, sugar and butter to improve her income and her quality of life. Rosario’s dream is to own her own pastry shop.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for use in her bakery.

loans.name: Marco

texts.es:
Marco  es carpintero, elabora muebles y puertas de madera, vive en casa de sus padres en un acabado fino y piso de machimbre, su vivienda está ubicada en la zona de Irpavi de la ciudad de La Paz.
Marco  es carpintero, del cual genera sus ingresos para cubrir sus gastos de alimentación, luz, agua;  el crédito lo  requiere para la compra de materia prima (madera) y así aumentar su producción y  mejorar sus ingresos y su calidad de vida.
El sueño de  Marco  es ampliar su taller de carpintería y terminar sus estudios universitarios.
texts.en: Marco is a carpenter; he makes wooden furniture and doors. He lives in his parents’ house; it is a finished home with a wood floor. His house is located in the city of La Paz’s Irpavi zone. Marco is a carpenter and earns income to cover his food, electricity and water expenses. He needs the loan to buy raw materials (wood) to increase production and improve his income and quality of life. Marco’s dream is to expand his carpentry shop and to finish his university studies.

loans.use: to buy wood for use in his carpentry business.

loans.name: Diana Yaneth

texts.es: Diana es una mujer de 26 años de edad, es madre de un hijo de 8 años y actualmente vive en unión libre con su pareja. Se dedica a la venta de productos Amway desde hace varios meses, actividad que conoció por medio de una amiga que la invitó a una charla sobre los productos. Inicialmente los compraba para su uso personal y luego comenzó a recomendarlos a las personas que conocía y, de esta forma comenzó a crecer su negocio, con lo cual ha obtenido ingresos para el sustento de su hogar. Con el crédito que solicita en la Corporación desea comprar más mercancía de Amway (productos de aseo para el hogar, aseo personal, vitaminas y nutrientes) con un descuento del 42%, con el fin de poder ofrecer más variedad y tener mayor rentabilidad en sus ventas. Su principal sueño es aumentar sus ventas hasta lograr ganancias millonarias por mes para mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Diana is a 26 year-old woman, who is the mother of an 8 year-old son and lives in a common law relationship with her partner. She has been selling Amway products for several months, a business she learned about through a friend who invited her to a talk about the products. Initially she bought them for her personal use and then began to recommend them to people she knew and in this way her business began to grow. Thus she has generated an income to support her household.

With the loan she has requested from Interactuar she wants to purchase more Amway merchandise (household cleaning products, personal cleaning items, vitamins and nutrients) at a 42% discount with the goal of being able to offer more variety and of earning more profits in her sales. 

Her principal dream is to increase her sales to make millions in earnings each month in order to improve her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more Amway merchandise (household cleaning products, personal cleaning items, vitamins and nutrients)

loans.name: Joselyn Verónica

texts.es: Joselyn Verónica, tiene la edad  de 18 años, está soltera,  vive con sus padres y hermanos, los cuales son mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de  algunos materiales  que le puedan facilitar la reparación de su vivienda y pagar mano de obra de la reparación, y de esta manera eliminar algunas  problemas de entradas de agua a la vivienda en el periodo de lluvia que ya está iniciando y así poderle ofrecer una mejor calidad de vida a su familia. Con esta compra pretende hacer una mejora de buena calidad a su casa y que su familia mejoré su calidad de vida y aprovechar precios bajos en algunos materiales y que son de buena calidad. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Joselyn Verónica is 18 years old, single, and lives with her parents and siblings, who are her greatest priority. With her loan she intends to buy some materials that can help with the repair of her home and pay laborers who will be making the repairs, and in this way eliminate some problems with water entering the home as the rainy season is now starting, and in this way she can offer a better quality of life for her family. With this purchase she intends to improve the quality of her house and the quality of life for her family, taking advantage of the lower prices for some good quality materials. This is the first loan she has received from FUDECOSUR. She hasn't received other loans from banks, but FUDECOSUR has provided a loan more easily and with much lower interest rates.

loans.use: to make home repairs.

loans.name: Rosalba

texts.es: Rosalba es una señora de 69 años de edad, es viuda y madre de 4 hijos. Actualmente es ama de casa, pero desea capacitarse porque le gusta y además quiere montar un negocio con uno de sus hijos. El crédito que solicita es para el pago de un curso de Panificación que ofrece la Corporación, ya que ven es este curso una idea de negocio para un futuro cercano y de esta forma poder generar ingresos para el sostenimiento de su hogar. Su mayor sueño es poder montar su negocio, establecerlo y trabajar para que sea reconocido.
texts.en:
Rosalba is a 69 year-old lady. She is a widow and the mother of four offspring. Currently she is a homemaker but she wants to get training because she enjoys it and she wants to start a business with her children. 

She is applying for a loan to pay for a bread making course that Interactuar offers because this course gives her an idea for a business in the near future. In this way she will be able to generate an income to maintain her household.

Her greatest dream is to able to start a business, establish it and work so that it will be well known.

loans.use: to pay for a bread making course.

loans.name: Mujeres Con Propósito (Women With A Purpose) Group

texts.en:
This group is named Mujeres con Propósito (Women with a Purpose).  It is composed of 8 hard working women that participate in buying and selling and food production at the local market in Cuyotenango, Suchitepéquez.
The group is eager to learn more about their expenses and profits.  

Some of them have had their businesses for a long time and are aware that they do not know how to effectively manage their money and separate personal and business expenses.  

They are excited about the educational sessions they are going to receive and the monthly visit from the Business Advisor for the next  9 months.

One of the members of this group is Angélica, a 68 year old widow, who for 22 years has been selling small chickens (she buys 1 day chicks, feeds them for about a week and then sells them again).  Angelica has a 6th grade education.  

She has devoted her life to taking care of her family; her kids are all grown and one of them and his family now lives with her.  She supports herself and also provides for her son´s family.  Angélica is very well known in her community.  When she started this business she sold 100 little chicks per month and now she sells up to 3,000 chicks a month with an approximate profit of Q3,275 (US$425). She works 120 hours a month  averaging $3.54/hour.  

Angelica hired one person to help her take care of the chickens because last year she lost her sight in one eye due to a cataract. Her dream is to improve her profits by 29% to be able to save enough money for cataract surgery.

loans.use: Increase profit

loans.name: Esther

texts.en:
Esther is Liberian. She resides in Buchanan, the capital city of Grand Bassa county. The county is located by the sea and is known for its beaches and fish. In addition, many logging companies are also located in the city. People from Buchanan are known for their love of fufu, a cassava based dough typically eaten with soup or sauce. 

Esther is 46 years old, she is married and has three children between 26 and eight years old. Two of her children are currently living at home and attending school. Esther has owned her own business, selling rice, pepper, oil, vita, onions, etc., for the past eight years. She will use the requested loan proceeds to purchase more rice, pepper, oil, vita, onions, etc. to resell. On average, Esther works ten hours a day from Monday to Saturday. She started her business with a small amount of money from her husband. She transports her merchandise by shared taxi. Her largest challenge is the rainy season. Her favorite part of her business is her income. In the future, she would like to build a house. She is grateful for your support!

loans.use: to purchase more rice, pepper, oil, vita, onions, etc. to resell.

loans.name: Freddy

texts.es: Freddy, tiene la edad  de 18 años, está soltero, vive con sus padres y hermanos  que son su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de una vaca con una cría al destete y también se encuentra preñada. La idea es aprovechar el espacio que tiene de pasto de buena calidad y con un desarrollo adecuado y la disponibilidad de agua potable y las buenas condiciones de terreno y clima para poder tener estos animales y a la vez obtener algo de leche y desarrollar terneros para en el futuro venderlos para carne. Con esta compra podrá desarrollar una actividad más, y a la vez tener un ahorro que le permitirá ir teniendo más animales e invertir más en la propiedad.  Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Él no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Freddy is 18-years-old, he is single, lives with his parents and brothers who are his main priority. With the loan he will buy a pregnant cow that also has a weaning calf. The idea is to take advantage of the following situation: space available with high quality grass, gradual development of the cow, the disposable water, the good condition of the land, the ideal climate to have animals, the ability to have milk, and growing the calves to sell them for meat in the future. With this purchase, he will be able to develop one more activity and simultaneously have a savings that will allow him to purchase more animals and invest in his property.

This is his first loan that he is receiving through Fudecosur. He has not had previous loans in banks, but Fudecosur has provided the loan with greater ease and much lower interest rates.

loans.use: to purchase cattle and meat

loans.name: Prudencia

texts.es:
Prudencia se dedica al lavado de arena y ademas elabora mantas de hilo para señoras de pollera, vive en alquiler con un acabado de abode y piso de cemento, su vivienda esta ubicada el la zona de Irpavi de la ciudad de La Paz.

Prudencia lava arena y elabora polleras, del cual genera sus ingresos para cubrir sus gastos de alimentación, luz, agua;  el crédito lo  requiere para el aumento de capital: comprará hilo para aumentar su producción de polleras y así mejorar su ingresos y su calidad de vida.
El sueño de Prudencia es tener un taller de tejido y tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
Prudencia makes a living from washing sand and also makes shawls of thread for women who dress in the traditional manner. She lives in a rented adobe house with a cement floor. Her home is located in the Irpavi area of the city of La Paz.

Prudencia washes sand and makes traditional clothing, from which she generates her income to cover expenses for food, electricity and water. She requires the loan to increase her working capital. She will buy thread to increase her production of shawls and thus improve her earnings and her quality of life. 

Prudencia's dream is to have a weaving workshop, and to own a house.

loans.use: to buy thread for her business

loans.name: James

texts.en:
James lives in the Muranga area of Kenya, which lies in the central Rift Valley. He has 4 children and has been doing this work for 33 years. His primary income sources are milk, eggs, tea, crops, and an employer pension.

He stated that dairy farming is pleasurable to him because it is not labor-intensive and because of the regular income. His biggest challenge is a lack of water for irrigation. Animals on the farm have been given the names of Munyaka, meaning luck, and Wanjiku, after his late wife.

James said that he chose Juhudi Kilimo for this loan because he wants to expand his farming projects. During Juhudi's required micro-finance training session, this client learned that microfinance gives loans with minimal collateral.

His highest monthly expense is farming costs. He said that this loan will benefit his family by allowing him to further expand his fairy business and earn more income. 

As part of Juhudi's loan appraisal process, each borrower's assets are evaluated. James owns a cow, poultry, and a pump, but does not own a pig, bicycle, motorcycle, or automobile. Juhudi Kilimo also tries to measure any change in living standards based on this loan. This borrower has a mosquito net, electricity, running water, TV, and DVD player in his house, but does not have solar power, or a sewing machine.

Note: To create this loan profile, Juhudi Kilimo used a mobile device to gather information in the field and send the data to a central online repository, thus reducing paper use, making the process more efficient, and keeping costs down."

loans.use: to purchase a dairy unit.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es: Rosa, tiene la edad  de 51 años, está casada,  vive con su esposo y sus hijos los cuales su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de semilla de frijol de buena calidad y que se desarrolle bien en las condiciones de la zona, fertilizantes adecuados y otros productos para aplicarle a la siembra y así que tenga una buena geminación, además pagar mano de obra para la aplicación de los productos y asistencia de la plantación una vez que tenga desarrollo, y de esta manera asegurarse de realizar un buen trabajo. Lo que pretende es aprovechar las buenas condiciones de clima y suelo que cuenta la zona para este cultivo, y también poner en práctica la experiencia de varios años en el manejo de granos básicos. Además de poder comprar los mejores productos y de mejor calidad para que su plantación tenga un buen desarrollo y sanidad al igual que una cosecha adecuada, y tener a corto plazo una producción importante. Con el ingreso de la cosecha que espera obtener quiere utilizarla en el bienestar y estudio de su familia y cumplir con algunas metas familiares y seguir invirtiendo más en los cultivos. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Él no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Rosa is 51 years old, married, and lives with her husband and their children which are her major priority. With this loan she intends to purchase bean seeds of good quality, and to assure that they will develop well under conditions in this zone, adequate fertilizers and other products for application to the crop, assuring a good germination. Also, she wishes to pay laborers for applying the products and assisting with the plants once they develop, in this way, assuring good results.

Rosa intends is to take advantage of the good climate and soil conditions the zone enjoys for the crop and, also, to put in practice her experience of various years in managing basic grains. In addition to being able to buy products of the best quality to assure that her plantings may have a good and healthy development and an adequate production, she hopes for an important harvest in the short run. 

The income Rosa expects to obtain from the harvest will be utilized for her family's well-being and the education of her children, and to comply with other family goals, plus continue investing in her crops.

This is Rosa's 1st loan through FUDECOSUR. She has had no previous loans from state banks, but FUDECOSUR has offered her the loan under the best terms and at a much lower interest rate.
